summary: Implemented world-class FWI calculator matching BurnP3+/Prometheus

learning_events.content: Implement complete Canadian FWI System from raw meteorological data
Implemented all 6 FWI components: FFMC, DMC, DC, ISI, BUI, FWI
FFMC calculation: moisture content with rain adjustment and EMC
DMC/DC: day length factors by latitude and month
FWI time lags: FFMC (2/3 day), DMC (15 days), DC (52 days)
Rain reduces FFMC dramatically but DMC/DC respond slowly
Hourly FWI: diurnal adjustment of FFMC and ISI based on temp/RH/wind
Tested against Fort McMurray (FWI=141.3) and Jasper (FWI=160.9)
Multi-day sequences show realistic fire danger progression

metadata.evidence: Complete FWI system with hourly capability

learning_events.content: Completed: Priority 1: Hourly Weather System with FWI Calculation
